description: Defines a Flutter widget MediaPosterCard that displays a focusable media poster with overlay, tilt effect on focus, and callbacks for focus and activation.

classes.name: MediaPosterCard
classes.description: A focusable media poster card widget that shows an image with a title overlay, tilt effect on focus, and focus/activation callbacks.

classes.name: _MediaPosterCardState
classes.description: State class managing focus, hover, and pressed states, building the animated media poster with tilt and overlay effects.

methods.name: _imageByPath
methods.description: Returns an Image widget from a local asset or network URL based on the poster path.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, including focus detection, tilt transformation, shadow effects, overlay, and title.
